code: import api from'./api';export const getEvents=async function(){let filters=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const params=new URLSearchParams();if(filters.category)params.append('category',filters.category);if(filters.location)params.append('location',filters.location);if(filters.upcoming!==undefined)params.append('upcoming',filters.upcoming);const response=await api.get('/events',{params});return response.data;};export const getEventById=async id=>{const response=await api.get("/events/".concat(id));return response.data;};export const createEvent=async eventData=>{const response=await api.post('/events',eventData);return response.data;};export const rsvpToEvent=async(eventId,rsvpData)=>{const response=await api.post("/rsvp/".concat(eventId),rsvpData);return response.data;};
